interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Packs Wig Stand Holder,Portable Wig Hanger for All Wigs Long and Short Hair and Hats,Durable Collapsible Travel Wig Stands Display Tool Dryer Holder(3 Pack, Pink)
Review Date: 2020/11/14
Store: MarchQueen
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.64 x 7.87 x 2.6 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841565'}
Review Text: the idea of these are really nice. it’s just a little flimsy and the directions are all in mandarin or something, so putting them together was really a chore. once they are put together properly it does hold up wigs and creates more space, just the durability of them is a concern.
Review Title: nice concept, a little flimsy
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

VOOADA
{'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.87 x 2.05 inches; 1.37 Pounds', 'UPC': '699936288523'}
Love this drill! It works great and it’s super easy to use for beginners.
Beginner friendly, and easy to use.
SYbeauty Pre Stretched Braiding Hair Extensions 26 Inch 10 Packs/Lot Synthetic Kanekalon Ombre Braiding Hair Professional Soft Yaki Texture Natural Easy Braid Crochet Hair (26", 1B)
SYbeauty
{'Brand': 'SYbeauty', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Style': 'Braiding Hair Pre Stretched', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '15.2 x 10.91 x 2.56 inches; 1.47 Pounds', 'UPC': '190372769442'}
[[VIDEOID:c0aae0fa87abeb3d72ce48235a63c3ac]] I am amazed with the quality of this hair. the fibers is premium quality; it doesn’t tangle (unless you’re like me and keep restarting a braid.) and it’s super silky and smooth whilst braiding. Doesn’t burn your fingers! Nice quality product! The hair also super flowly, it has a lot of movement before dipping.
Highly recommend!
JARGOD 1pcs 100% Kolinsky Sable Acrylic Nails Round Nail Art Brush (size 4)
JARGOD
{'Brand': 'JARGOD', 'Handle Material': 'Acrylic', 'Head Material': 'Kolinsky', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 0.3 x 0.3 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
This brush is perfect. I did a full overlay Acrylic set and they were perfect. Although I prefer this particular brush for nail due the smaller size. It still works great for doing artificial nail sets.
Great brush! It’s a small size.
C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz.
C'est Moi
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'}
Super nice! Easy to use and removes makeup efficiently. Just put a little on a cotton ball and wipes right off. I used this for my eyeshadow, liner and mascara. Does the job! And I have sensitive skin and this has not caused any problems!
Gets the job done!
6 Pack Spray Bottles,Empty Plastic Clear Small Transparent Travel Bottles Pump Bottle Lotion Dispenser Bottle Set,Refillable Liquid Containers 3oz and 2 oz
Cehomi
{'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.14 x 1.1 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Nice travel size spray bottles and pumps! Perfect for hand sanitizers or just water spray bottles. The pumps and spray bottles work as expected and it’s a value kit, so 3 of each!
6 pieces, works as expected and travel size.
Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre Red Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women
Altaba
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Altaba'}
This is a cute wig for a quick style change! It doesn’t look super realistic, but I wore it with a hat which made it perfect for my outfit! I wouldn’t recommend it for daily wear, but definitely for cosplay, a photoshoot, or a outfit with a stylish hat!
Cute for a style change! Not a realistic wig.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to seek easy-to-use, beginner-friendly products, particularly in personal care and beauty. Their recent purchase of wig stands indicates an interest in functional accessories that enable quick style changes, aligned with their appreciation for versatile and effective solutions.

- **User Experience Focus:** The user emphasizes practicality and high-quality items that enhance their grooming routine. However, a recent interaction suggests some hesitation regarding product durability, highlighting their preference for reliable designs suited for specific occasions rather than everyday use.

- **Rating Trends:** The user generally provides positive feedback but has recently rated a product lower due to concerns about its flimsy nature and difficult assembly instructions. This reflects a growing attention to the quality and usability of products alongside their aesthetic appeal.

- **Interest Areas:** Their interests now include portable and functional accessories that not only facilitate style changes but also support efficient organization, underscoring their practical approach to grooming and self-expression. 

- **Consistency:** Engagement patterns have remained stable, with a focus on convenience, quality, and versatility. The recent experience emphasizes the user's desire for products that meet high standards of durability and usability, reinforcing their commitment to effective and user-friendly self-care.

This profile illustrates the user's continual pursuit of convenient and stylish solutions, now coupled with a heightened emphasis on product reliability and straightforward usability.
